item.description:
Welcome! Let's be very clear with each other!

Are you a driven music-professional with a type-a personality constantly on the go and striving to make it big in the industry?

Are you a fashionista with future-perfect taste looking to make a splash on the scene?

Are you a budding DJ / rapper / producer who is ready to promote your label / EP / "phat beatz?"

This group is probably not for you.

Are you an average joe/jane with a day job who likes to make a little music on the side?

Are you looking for people to give you considerate feedback on your music or just "talk shop?"

Are you looking for normal people to share some of your musical creations with, but haven't found a group that you feel comfortable with?

You've come to the right place.

1) We have jobs. We have children. We have lives, but music is a part of it.

2) We like to share our music but might be shy, or apprehensive, or new.

3) We like all kinds of music, but we understand that you might not like every style. No problem, we're very zen about it...just don't hurt anyone and be honest if it "isn't your thing"...we'll get input from someone else.

4) We're here to build a small community of people who share their music in a relaxed way, online and face to face. We meet in person and talk or chat or play, but we also help each other share our music online if we want to.

We are friendly. Hello.

-Luke

----

A little history...

If you arrived here from a previous/old link or bookmark and are looking for the digital musicians meetup, that group appears to have folded. Too bad really as they were nice folks!
item.name: Music Makers With Relaxed Expectations
